description:
Provide some JSON, get a nice looking collapsible tree view.

⁉️ Demo available here 👉🏽 https://json-viewer.bubbleapps.io/version-test?

View the editor 👉🏽 https://bubble.io/page?name=index&id=json-viewer&tab=tabs-1


✅ Cool
✅ Useful
✅ Pure JS
name: JSON Viewer
plugin_instructions: The plugin uses a normal text field and transforms it into a JSON structure. Just pass some text with a correct JSON format and it will show the result in a nice viewer.
